TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower (warrior/axeman/champion/phalanx) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower (warrior/axeman/champion/phalanx) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower (warrior/axeman/champion/phalanx) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower (warrior/axeman/champion/phalanx) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower (warrior/axeman/champion/phalanx) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can acquire historical leader traits from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can acquire historical leader traits from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can acquire historical leader traits from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can acquire historical leader traits from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can acquire historical leader traits from a conquerred civilization.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can convert all remaining units from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can convert all remaining units from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can convert all remaining units from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can convert all remaining units from a conquerred civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can convert all remaining units from a conquerred civilization.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions based on levels.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions based on levels.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions based on levels.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions based on levels.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions based on levels.

TEXT.English: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands.
TEXT.French: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands.
TEXT.German: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands.
TEXT.Italian: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands.
TEXT.Spanish: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands.
